abstract: Saturday Profile of Giulia Enders, author of book Gut: The Inside Story of Our Body's Most Underrated Organ, which has been bestseller in Germany since its release and was published in United States in May.
lead_paragraph: After Giulia Enders investigated an illness that had left her covered with sores as a teenager, she began taking it upon herself to educate people about digestion.

headline.main: A German Writer Translates a Puzzling Illness Into a Best-Selling Book
headline.print_headline: Young German Glamorizes the Gastroenterological After a Teenage Illness

snippet: After Giulia Enders investigated an illness that had left her covered with sores as a teenager, she began taking it upon herself to educate people about digestion.

keywords.value: Gut: The Inside Story of Our Body's Most Underrated Organ (Book)
